TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MessageQueueException extends System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException

summary.span: 发生 Microsoft 消息队列内部错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown if a Microsoft Message Queuing internal error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与相关联异常类都由消息队列应加以处理与通过你的代码中的内部错误。Exceptions associated with the class are generated by internal errors within Message Queuing that should be dealt with through your code. 每个异常都由错误代码和描述错误来源的文本字符串。Every exception consists of an error code and a text string that describes the source of the error. 请参阅类这些错误代码及其说明的列表。See the class for a list of these error codes and their descriptions. 如果 在 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数设置为 true 的情况下打开一个队列，则随后尝试从该队列中进行读取的任何 都会由于共享冲突而生成 异常。If a opens a queue with the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter set to true, any that subsequently tries to read from the queue generates a exception because of a sharing violation. 如果一个 尝试以独占模式访问队列，而此时另一个 已经以非独占方式访问该队列，则引发与此相同的异常。The same exception is thrown if a tries to access the queue in exclusive mode while another already has nonexclusive access to the queue. > **不支持警报标记!!!****alert tag is not supported!!!!** > 是可识别线程单元的。 is threading-apartment–aware. Visual Basic 将设置到的主线程的状态`STA`，因此您必须首先应用中`Main`子例程。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 异常。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/CPP/mqexistsdelete.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/CS/mqexistsdelete.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/VB/mqexistsdelete.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取描述消息队列错误的值。

span.span: Gets a value that describes the Message Queuing error.

value.span: 生成此 的消息队列内部错误的说明。

span.span: The description of the Message Queuing internal error that generated this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您获取此属性时，该方法尝试检索与关联的文本字符串属性。When you get this property, the method attempts to retrieve the text string associated with the property. 如果此方法无法解释消息队列生成的错误代码属性获取的值`UnknownError`。If the method is unable to interpret the error code that Message Queuing generated, the property gets the value `UnknownError`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageQueueErrorCode As MessageQueueErrorCode
public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueueErrorCode MessageQueueErrorCode { System::Messaging::MessageQueueErrorCode get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与此异常关联的错误代码。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the error code associated with this exception.

value.span: 一个 ，它标识生成的错误信息队列的类型。

span.span: A that identifies the type of error Message Queuing generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含与此关联的字符串的更详细地描述错误的来源。The property contains a string associated with this that more fully describes the source of the error.
